title: 90% of people when they see a big post

replies.body:
Most would probably vote "Caught Red Handed", but then they would try to defend themselves by saying...

http://img.pandawhale.com/post-24641-I-skimmed-it-gif-Scott-Pilgrim-JIXE.gif
light blue on white's pretty hard to read...I must be getting old qq
I wasn't the one that made the GIF, so that's a fault on the person who DID make it.

Oh hey it's that meme guy

http://giphy.com/gifs/chris-pratt-nebula-guardians-of-the-galaxy-MTN4uwitLC1GM

I mean, you aren't... exactly wrong with him. \
http://www.gifwave.com/media/368646_joke-eel.gif
~~cries because I retreated to the shadows when I had almost reached immortality on the boards~~
Is this like Laughing Fish's smurf or something?

> [{quoted}](name=Mallecke,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AYkuAkQZ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-09T04:55:14.687+0000)
>
> Is this like Laughing Fish's smurf or something?

Who him or me?  If refering to me.  No sorry I'm not laughing fish although I am a fan
Hey, can you put in a TLDR? Thanks
I would have voted, but I TLDR'd the poll.

Caught red handed.

To be completely honest though, if the text got decent readability I might read it. But if it's just 50 lines of text with absolutely 0 attempt at formatting then I'm out. What's so hard in using your enter key twice to create a gap between each paragraph, or hell, even this:

---------------------
I actually try to read it, but I usually get bored half way through and just leave it.

> [{quoted}](name=Smart Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AYkuAkQZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-03-09T02:51:16.733+0000)
>
> I actually try to read it, but I usually get bored half way through and just leave it.

I haven't found anyone who posted something longer than 3-4 lines worth reading so far.

To be completely honest, whenever someone proposes a rework idea (whether it's for an ability or a whole Champion), I don't read it.
I feel really bad because people put lots of thought into these ideas, but it's just not interesting for me to read these user-proposed ability changes.
I skim through a couple times :c
